main event: Students observed a bright light moving in an elongated motion with a greenish yellow color, no sound.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 3-4 minutes.,The report suggests the object observed was probably a meteor.,The reddish color is commonly associated with meteor sightings.,Multiple witnesses observed the same object, which rules out a hoax.,The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light moving in an elongated motion
